DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study validate sensitivity specificity Respirio Flu Test eLab Flu Test detect Influenza A compare gold standard detection , Reverse Transcriptase Polymerase Chain Reaction ( RT-PCR ) . The secondary aim : Validate sensitivity specificity Respirio Flu Test eLab Flu Test detect Influenza B compare gold standard detection , Reverse Transcriptase Polymerase Chain Reaction ( RT-PCR ) ; Evaluate correct interpretation Respirio Flu Test subject influenza-like symptom ; Evaluate subject ' satisfaction convenience , comfort ease use Respirio Flu Test .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Ellume® Respirio Flu Test Ellume® eLab Flu Test Rapid Identification Influenza A/B
DOC.criteria: Male female subject age ≥ 1 year ; Rhinorrhea ; ≤ 5 day onset influenzalike illness symptom ; Subject ( parent/legal guardian ) capable willing give inform consent/assent ; Subject ( parent/legal guardian ) able read write English . Has undergone treatment antiviral within previous 7 day ; Has vaccinate mean influenza nasal spray/mist vaccine within previous 7 day ; Recent craniofacial injury surgery , include surgery correct deviation nasal septum , within previous 6 month ; Currently enrol another clinical trial use investigational device within 90 day precede informed consent ; Has prior exposure Respirio Flu Test eLab Flu Test .
